Articles.Content:
Well it also says that all the problems come from the computer lagging too much. Try setting the launch to water timer up more.

Ok I'll give that a try, thanks
Wait do I have to change the timer on all of the parts? If so that's a lot of txt files to edit >.>
Thanks for the update(i just saw this). This will come in handy when mining kethane underwater:wink:

Wait do I have to change the timer on all of the parts? If so that's a lot of txt files to edit >.>

You only need to change the timer on the command parts. So if its a carrier you need to change the timer for the control tower. the other ones you could change would be the r3 control tower, sub command pod, and the mini sub command pod. (not sure of there exact names, just find them in the game) But you don't have to edit any text files, the .23 update included timer tweakables. Right click the control tower and there will be a slider for the launch to water timer set at 5. Change it to 8-10 and try to launch it then.

Bit of a delay, the mini-sub was a hassle to balance in the water, I decided to write some pitch balancing for the subs. I'm 90% done it, but will need testing to ensure it works of course. I'll keep you guys/girls updated.

Thanks.

Bit of a delay, the mini-sub was a hassle to balance in the water, I decided to write some pitch balancing for the subs. I'm 90% done it, but will need testing to ensure it works of course. I'll keep you guys/girls updated.

Awesome! at first i thought this would come fast, but after i understood what you were doing i figured it would take much longer. you sir are a modding machine.

What release is next is it 4.5 or 5 there seem to be mix reports

If its 4.5 is it solely an update with skillful integration or is it a content update too

What release is next is it 4.5 or 5 there seem to be mix reports

Both. 4.5 should bring us skillful integration, moved mines to skillful, and give us the warship hull and the Carrier props. (yay no more magic propulsion!)

Hey infinite? i know you are probably busy with RL stuff, but do you think you could give us an update? if not that's fine

it would be awesome if ID can put torpedo tubes in the sub's and give it a more realistic color instead of bright blue but anyways that's awesome, and i think something like a U-boat model would be awesome, something smaller than the blue sub and too small too carry missiles but big enough to carry a good amount of torpedoes
Will the submarine get a recolor, it currently looks a bit weird painted all blue like that, maybe a paint job similar to the Foxtrot class?
Yeah the blue seems a bit bright. not a huge problem. but easily fixable. i think.

*sees people suggesting Submarines to add*

OSCAR II!
So if I have skillful installed I can't get this mod correct?

So if I have skillful installed I can't get this mod correct?

No, you can still get this mod. The weapons just won't damage the boat parts. It's not a mod conflict problem, it's just that all the codes don't get shared between skillful and boat parts. There's nothing stopping you from having both mods. (I use them both)
